scripts.watch: npx mkdirp dist && npx watchify src/index.js -t babelify --outfile dist/index.js -dv
scripts.devel: rm -rf node_modules/interactive-program-repair && ln -s ../../../ node_modules/interactive-program-repair; rm -rf node_modules/tabletrobotface-starter-lib && ln -s ../../../pkgs/tabletrobotface-starter-lib node_modules/tabletrobotface-starter-lib;
